summary.title: The Life of a Bubble
summary.tagLine: Round and round, down the drain.
summary.about: Discover the fascinating life of a bubble as it travels down the drain and on to adventure.

1.title: Life is Quick
1.prose: You are a happy little bubble, floating in the tub.  Oops, someone pulled the drain.  You float towards it.  Wheee!!!  As you are squeezed down the drain you pop.
1.endPrompt: Yup, that's it.  Life is short for a bubble.
